ActCorrections and Conditional Release Act
PrecisAppointment of HOWARD M. BRUCE of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a part-time member of the Ontario Regional Division of the Parole Board of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a period of three years, effective November 7, 2022.
